verbs.description: [ARG0: WASHINGTON] -- [V: Praising] [ARG1: the strength of America 's oldest alliance] , [ARG0: President Donald Trump] welcomed French President Emmanuel Macron to the White House Tuesday with a pomp - filled ceremony on the South Lawn .

[R-ARG0: WASHINGTON] -- [R-ARG0: Praising the strength of America 's oldest alliance] , [ARG0: President Donald Trump] [V: welcomed] [ARG1: French President Emmanuel Macron] [ARG2: to the White House] [ARGM-TMP: Tuesday] [ARGM-MNR: with a pomp - filled ceremony on the South Lawn] .

WASHINGTON -- Praising the strength of America 's oldest alliance , President Donald Trump welcomed French President Emmanuel Macron to the White House Tuesday with a [ARG2: pomp] - [V: filled] [ARG1: ceremony] on the South Lawn .
